trans-unit.source: Provides atomic operations for variables that are shared by multiple threads.
trans-unit.target: 为多个线程共享的变量提供原子操作。

trans-unit.source: The methods of this class help protect against errors that can occur when the scheduler switches contexts while a thread is updating a variable that can be accessed by other threads, or when two threads are executing concurrently on separate processors.
trans-unit.target: 此类的方法有助于防止计划程序切换上下文时线程在更新变量可访问由其他线程，或者在不同处理器的两个线程并发执行就可能出现的错误。

trans-unit.source: The members of this class do not throw exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 此类的成员不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Increment%2A> and <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Decrement%2A> methods increment or decrement a variable and store the resulting value in a single operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Increment%2A>和<xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Decrement%2A>方法递增或递减的变量并在单个操作中存储生成的值。

trans-unit.source: On most computers, incrementing a variable is not an atomic operation, requiring the following steps:
trans-unit.target: 在大多数计算机上递增变量不是原子操作，需要执行下列步骤：

trans-unit.source: Load a value from an instance variable into a register.
trans-unit.target: 实例变量的值加载到寄存器中。

trans-unit.source: Increment or decrement the value.
trans-unit.target: 递增或递减值。

trans-unit.source: Store the value in the instance variable.
trans-unit.target: 实例变量中存储值。

trans-unit.source: If you do not use <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Increment%2A> and <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Decrement%2A>, a thread can be preempted after executing the first two steps.
trans-unit.target: 如果不使用<xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Increment%2A>和<xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Decrement%2A>，线程可以在执行前两个步骤后被抢占。

trans-unit.source: Another thread can then execute all three steps.
trans-unit.target: 然后，另一个线程可以执行所有三个步骤。

trans-unit.source: When the first thread resumes execution, it overwrites the value in the instance variable, and the effect of the increment or decrement performed by the second thread is lost.
trans-unit.target: 当第一个线程继续执行时，它将覆盖在实例变量中，值和递增或递减执行的第二个线程的影响是丢失。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Exchange%2A> method atomically exchanges the values of the specified variables.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Exchange%2A>以原子方式方法将指定的变量的值进行交换。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.CompareExchange%2A> method combines two operations: comparing two values and storing a third value in one of the variables, based on the outcome of the comparison.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.CompareExchange%2A>方法组合了两个操作： 比较两个值和存储第三个值中的变量，根据比较的结果之一。

trans-unit.source: The compare and exchange operations are performed as an atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: 作为一个原子操作执行的比较和交换操作。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a thread-safe resource locking mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示一个线程安全资源锁定机制。

trans-unit.source: This type is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 此类型是线程安全的。

trans-unit.source: Adds two integers and replaces the first integer with the sum, as an atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: 以原子操作的形式，添加两个整数并用两者的和替换第一个整数。

trans-unit.source: A variable containing the first value to be added.
trans-unit.target: 一个变量，包含要添加的第一个值。

trans-unit.source: The sum of the two values is stored in <c>location1</c>.
trans-unit.target: 两个值的和存储在 <c>location1</c> 中。

trans-unit.source: The value to be added to the integer at <c>location1</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到整数中的 <c>location1</c> 位置的值。

trans-unit.source: Adds two 32-bit integers and replaces the first integer with the sum, as an atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: 对两个 32 位整数进行求和并用和替换第一个整数，上述操作作为一个原子操作完成。

trans-unit.source: The new value stored at <paramref name="location1" />.
trans-unit.target: 存储在 <paramref name="location1" /> 处的新值。

trans-unit.source: This method handles an overflow condition by wrapping: if the value at `location1` is <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> and `value` is 1, the result is <xref:System.Int32.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>; if `value` is 2, the result is (<xref:System.Int32.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> + 1); and so on.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通过包装来处理溢出情况： 如果处的值`location1`是<xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>和`value`为 1，则结果是<xref:System.Int32.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>; 如果`value`为 2，则结果为 (<xref:System.Int32.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> + 1); 等等。

trans-unit.source: No exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 不引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The address of <paramref name="location1" /> is a null pointer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location1" /> 的地址为空指针。

trans-unit.source: A variable containing the first value to be added.
trans-unit.target: 一个变量，包含要添加的第一个值。

trans-unit.source: The sum of the two values is stored in <c>location1</c>.
trans-unit.target: 两个值的和存储在 <c>location1</c> 中。

trans-unit.source: The value to be added to the integer at <c>location1</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到整数中的 <c>location1</c> 位置的值。

trans-unit.source: Adds two 64-bit integers and replaces the first integer with the sum, as an atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: 对两个 64 位整数进行求和并用和替换第一个整数，上述操作作为一个原子操作完成。

trans-unit.source: The new value stored at <paramref name="location1" />.
trans-unit.target: 存储在 <paramref name="location1" /> 处的新值。

trans-unit.source: This method handles an overflow condition by wrapping: if the value at `location1` is <xref:System.Int64.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> and `value` is 1, the result is <xref:System.Int64.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>; if `value` is 2, the result is (<xref:System.Int64.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> + 1); and so on.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通过包装来处理溢出情况： 如果处的值`location1`是<xref:System.Int64.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>和`value`为 1，则结果是<xref:System.Int64.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>; 如果`value`为 2，则结果为 (<xref:System.Int64.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> + 1); 等等。

trans-unit.source: No exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 不引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Read%2A> method and the 64-bit overloads of the <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Increment%2A>, <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Decrement%2A>, and <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Add%2A> methods are truly atomic only on systems where a <xref:System.IntPtr?displayProperty=nameWithType> is 64 bits long.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Read%2A>方法和的 64 位重载<xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Increment%2A>， <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Decrement%2A>，和<xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Add%2A>方法是仅在系统上真正原子是其中<xref:System.IntPtr?displayProperty=nameWithType>长为 64 位。

trans-unit.source: On other systems, these methods are atomic with respect to each other, but not with respect to other means of accessing the data.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法的其他系统上和 64 位，但不是与其他方法来访问数据。

trans-unit.source: Thus, to be thread safe on 32-bit systems, any access to a 64-bit value must be made through the members of the <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked> class.
trans-unit.target: 因此，是线程安全在 32 位系统上，64 位值的任何访问都必须通过的成员<xref:System.Threading.Interlocked>类。

trans-unit.source: The address of <paramref name="location1" /> is a null pointer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location1" /> 的地址为空指针。

trans-unit.source: Compares two values for equality and, if they are equal, replaces the first value.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个值是否相等，如果相等，则替换第一个值。

trans-unit.source: The destination, whose value is compared with <c>comparand</c> and possibly replaced.
trans-unit.target: 其值将与 <c>comparand</c> 进行比较并且可能被替换的目标。

trans-unit.source: The value that replaces the destination value if the comparison results in equality.
trans-unit.target: 比较结果相等时替换目标值的值。

trans-unit.source: The value that is compared to the value at <c>location1</c>.
trans-unit.target: 与位于 <c>location1</c> 处的值进行比较的值。

trans-unit.source: Compares two double-precision floating point numbers for equality and, if they are equal, replaces the first value.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个双精度浮点数是否相等，如果相等，则替换第一个值。

trans-unit.source: The original value in <paramref name="location1" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location1" /> 中的原始值。

trans-unit.source: If `comparand` and the value in `location1` are equal, then `value` is stored in `location1`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`comparand`和中的值`location1`相等，则`value`存储在`location1`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, no operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: 否则，不会执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: The compare and exchange operations are performed as an atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: 作为一个原子操作执行的比较和交换操作。

trans-unit.source: The return value of <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.CompareExchange%2A> is the original value in `location1`, whether or not the exchange takes place.
trans-unit.target: 返回值<xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.CompareExchange%2A>是中的原始值`location1`、 是否发生交换。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a thread-safe method that accumulates a running total of <xref:System.Double> values.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示将累积的运行总计，则一个线程安全方法<xref:System.Double>值。

trans-unit.source: Two threads add a series of <xref:System.Double> values using the thread-safe method and ordinary addition, and when the threads complete the totals are compared.
trans-unit.target: 两个线程添加一系列<xref:System.Double>值使用线程安全的方法和普通添加总计线程完成时被进行比较。

trans-unit.source: On a dual-processor computer, there is a significant difference in the totals.
trans-unit.target: 在双处理器计算机上，没有在总计中具有明显的差异。

trans-unit.source: In the thread-safe method, the initial value of the running total is saved, and then the <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.CompareExchange%2A> method is used to exchange the newly computed total with the old total.
trans-unit.target: 在线程安全的方法中，将保存的运行总计初始值，然后<xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.CompareExchange%2A>方法用于交换具有旧总新算出的总和。

trans-unit.source: If the return value is not equal to the saved value of the running total, then another thread has updated the total in the meantime.
trans-unit.target: 如果返回值不等于运行总计的已保存值，然后另一个线程已经更新在此期间。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the attempt to update the running total must be repeated.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，必须重复尝试更新运行总计。

trans-unit.source: The address of <paramref name="location1" /> is a null pointer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location1" /> 的地址为空指针。

trans-unit.source: The destination, whose value is compared with <c>comparand</c> and possibly replaced.
trans-unit.target: 其值将与 <c>comparand</c> 进行比较并且可能被替换的目标。

trans-unit.source: The value that replaces the destination value if the comparison results in equality.
trans-unit.target: 比较结果相等时替换目标值的值。

trans-unit.source: The value that is compared to the value at <c>location1</c>.
trans-unit.target: 与位于 <c>location1</c> 处的值进行比较的值。

trans-unit.source: Compares two 32-bit signed integers for equality and, if they are equal, replaces the first value.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个 32 位有符号整数是否相等，如果相等，则替换第一个值。

trans-unit.source: The original value in <paramref name="location1" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location1" /> 中的原始值。

trans-unit.source: If `comparand` and the value in `location1` are equal, then `value` is stored in `location1`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`comparand`和中的值`location1`相等，则`value`存储在`location1`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, no operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: 否则，不会执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: The compare and exchange operations are performed as an atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: 作为一个原子操作执行的比较和交换操作。

trans-unit.source: The return value of <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.CompareExchange%2A> is the original value in `location1`, whether or not the exchange takes place.
trans-unit.target: 返回值<xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.CompareExchange%2A>是中的原始值`location1`、 是否发生交换。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a thread-safe method that accumulates a running total.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将运行总计累积，则一个线程安全方法。

trans-unit.source: The initial value of the running total is saved, and then the <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.CompareExchange%2A> method is used to exchange the newly computed total with the old total.
trans-unit.target: 保存运行总计的初始值，然后<xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.CompareExchange%2A>方法用于交换具有旧总新算出的总和。

trans-unit.source: If the return value is not equal to the saved value of the running total, then another thread has updated the total in the meantime.
trans-unit.target: 如果返回值不等于运行总计的已保存值，然后另一个线程已经更新在此期间。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the attempt to update the running total must be repeated.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，必须重复尝试更新运行总计。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Add%2A> method, introduced in version 2.0 of the .NET Framework, provides a more convenient way to accumulate thread-safe running totals for integers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Add%2A>的.NET Framework 2.0 版中引入的方法可以更方便地累积线程安全的整数的运行总计。

trans-unit.source: The address of <paramref name="location1" /> is a null pointer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location1" /> 的地址为空指针。

trans-unit.source: The destination, whose value is compared with <c>comparand</c> and possibly replaced.
trans-unit.target: 其值将与 <c>comparand</c> 进行比较并且可能被替换的目标。

trans-unit.source: The value that replaces the destination value if the comparison results in equality.
trans-unit.target: 比较结果相等时替换目标值的值。

trans-unit.source: The value that is compared to the value at <c>location1</c>.
trans-unit.target: 与位于 <c>location1</c> 处的值进行比较的值。

trans-unit.source: Compares two 64-bit signed integers for equality and, if they are equal, replaces the first value.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个 64 位有符号整数是否相等，如果相等，则替换第一个值。

trans-unit.source: The original value in <paramref name="location1" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location1" /> 中的原始值。

trans-unit.source: If `comparand` and the value in `location1` are equal, then `value` is stored in `location1`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`comparand`和中的值`location1`相等，则`value`存储在`location1`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, no operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: 否则，不会执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: The compare and exchange operations are performed as an atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: 作为一个原子操作执行的比较和交换操作。

trans-unit.source: The return value of <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.CompareExchange%2A> is the original value in `location1`, whether or not the exchange takes place.
trans-unit.target: 返回值<xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.CompareExchange%2A>是中的原始值`location1`、 是否发生交换。

trans-unit.source: The address of <paramref name="location1" /> is a null pointer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location1" /> 的地址为空指针。

trans-unit.source: The destination <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" />, whose value is compared with the value of <c>comparand</c> and possibly replaced by <c>value</c>.
trans-unit.target: 其值与 <c>comparand</c> 的值进行比较并且可能被 <c>value</c> 替换的目标 <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" /> that replaces the destination value if the comparison results in equality.
trans-unit.target: 比较结果相等时替换目标值的 <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" /> that is compared to the value at <c>location1</c>.
trans-unit.target: 与位于 <c>location1</c> 处的值进行比较的 <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" />。

trans-unit.source: Compares two platform-specific handles or pointers for equality and, if they are equal, replaces the first one.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个平台特定的句柄或指针是否相等，如果相等，则替换第一个。

trans-unit.source: The original value in <paramref name="location1" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location1" /> 中的原始值。

trans-unit.source: If `comparand` and the value in `location1` are equal, then `value` is stored in `location1`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`comparand`和中的值`location1`相等，则`value`存储在`location1`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, no operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: 否则，不会执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: The compare and exchange operations are performed as an atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: 作为一个原子操作执行的比较和交换操作。

trans-unit.source: The return value of this method is the original value in `location1`, whether or not the exchange takes place.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的返回值是中的原始值`location1`、 是否发生交换。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IntPtr> is a platform-specific type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IntPtr> 是特定于平台的类型。

trans-unit.source: The address of <paramref name="location1" /> is a null pointer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location1" /> 的地址为空指针。

trans-unit.source: The destination object that is compared with <c>comparand</c> and possibly replaced.
trans-unit.target: 其值与 <c>comparand</c> 进行比较并且可能被替换的目标对象。

trans-unit.source: The object that replaces the destination object if the comparison results in equality.
trans-unit.target: 在比较结果相等时替换目标对象的对象。

trans-unit.source: The object that is compared to the object at <c>location1</c>.
trans-unit.target: 与位于 <c>location1</c> 处的对象进行比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: Compares two objects for reference equality and, if they are equal, replaces the first object.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个对象是否相等，如果相等，则替换第一个对象。

trans-unit.source: The original value in <paramref name="location1" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location1" /> 中的原始值。

trans-unit.source: If `comparand` and the object in `location1` are equal, then `value` is stored in `location1`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`comparand`和中的对象`location1`相等，则`value`存储在`location1`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, no operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: 否则，不会执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: The compare and exchange operations are performed as an atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: 作为一个原子操作执行的比较和交换操作。

trans-unit.source: The return value of <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.CompareExchange%2A> is the original value in `location1`, whether or not the exchange takes place.
trans-unit.target: 返回值<xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.CompareExchange%2A>是中的原始值`location1`、 是否发生交换。

trans-unit.source: Beginning with .NET Framework version 2.0, the <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.CompareExchange%60%601%28%60%600%40%2C%60%600%2C%60%600%29> method overload provides a type-safe alternative for reference types.
trans-unit.target: 从.NET Framework 2.0 版中，开始<xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.CompareExchange%60%601%28%60%600%40%2C%60%600%2C%60%600%29>方法重载提供类型安全的替代方法对于引用类型。

trans-unit.source: The objects are compared for reference equality, rather than <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 比较对象的引用相等性，而不是<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: As a result, two boxed instances of the same value type (for example, the integer 3) always appear to be unequal, and no operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: 因此，两个相同的装箱的实例值类型 （例如，整数 3） 始终显示为不相等，，会执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: Do not use this overload with value types.
trans-unit.target: 不要对值类型使用此重载。

trans-unit.source: The address of <paramref name="location1" /> is a null pointer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location1" /> 的地址为空指针。

trans-unit.source: The destination, whose value is compared with <c>comparand</c> and possibly replaced.
trans-unit.target: 其值将与 <c>comparand</c> 进行比较并且可能被替换的目标。

trans-unit.source: The value that replaces the destination value if the comparison results in equality.
trans-unit.target: 比较结果相等时替换目标值的值。

trans-unit.source: The value that is compared to the value at <c>location1</c>.
trans-unit.target: 与位于 <c>location1</c> 处的值进行比较的值。

trans-unit.source: Compares two single-precision floating point numbers for equality and, if they are equal, replaces the first value.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个单精度浮点数是否相等，如果相等，则替换第一个值。

trans-unit.source: The original value in <paramref name="location1" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location1" /> 中的原始值。

trans-unit.source: If `comparand` and the value in `location1` are equal, then `value` is stored in `location1`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`comparand`和中的值`location1`相等，则`value`存储在`location1`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, no operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: 否则，不会执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: The compare and exchange operations are performed as an atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: 作为一个原子操作执行的比较和交换操作。

trans-unit.source: The return value of <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.CompareExchange%2A> is the original value in `location1`, whether or not the exchange takes place.
trans-unit.target: 返回值<xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.CompareExchange%2A>是中的原始值`location1`、 是否发生交换。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a thread-safe method that accumulates a running total of <xref:System.Single> values.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示将累积的运行总计，则一个线程安全方法<xref:System.Single>值。

trans-unit.source: Two threads add a series of <xref:System.Single> values using the thread-safe method and ordinary addition, and when the threads complete the totals are compared.
trans-unit.target: 两个线程添加一系列<xref:System.Single>值使用线程安全的方法和普通添加总计线程完成时被进行比较。

trans-unit.source: On a dual-processor computer, there is a significant difference in the totals.
trans-unit.target: 在双处理器计算机上，没有在总计中具有明显的差异。

trans-unit.source: In the thread-safe method, the initial value of the running total is saved, and then the <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.CompareExchange%2A> method is used to exchange the newly computed total with the old total.
trans-unit.target: 在线程安全的方法中，将保存的运行总计初始值，然后<xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.CompareExchange%2A>方法用于交换具有旧总新算出的总和。

trans-unit.source: If the return value is not equal to the saved value of the running total, then another thread has updated the total in the meantime.
trans-unit.target: 如果返回值不等于运行总计的已保存值，然后另一个线程已经更新在此期间。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the attempt to update the running total must be repeated.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，必须重复尝试更新运行总计。

trans-unit.source: The address of <paramref name="location1" /> is a null pointer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location1" /> 的地址为空指针。

trans-unit.source: The type to be used for <c>location1</c>, <c>value</c>, and <c>comparand</c>.
trans-unit.target: 类型用于<c>位置 1</c>，<c>值</c>，和<c>比较字</c>。

trans-unit.source: This type must be a reference type.
trans-unit.target: 此类型必须是引用类型。

trans-unit.source: The destination, whose value is compared with <c>comparand</c> and possibly replaced.
trans-unit.target: 其值将与 <c>comparand</c> 进行比较并且可能被替换的目标。

trans-unit.source: This is a reference parameter (<see langword="ref" /> in C#, <see langword="ByRef" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 这是一个引用参数（C# 中为 <see langword="ref" />，Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="ByRef" />）。

trans-unit.source: The value that replaces the destination value if the comparison results in equality.
trans-unit.target: 比较结果相等时替换目标值的值。

trans-unit.source: The value that is compared to the value at <c>location1</c>.
trans-unit.target: 与位于 <c>location1</c> 处的值进行比较的值。

trans-unit.source: Compares two instances of the specified reference type <paramref name="T" /> for equality and, if they are equal, replaces the first one.
trans-unit.target: 比较指定的引用类型 <paramref name="T" /> 的两个实例是否相等，如果相等，则替换第一个。

trans-unit.source: The original value in <paramref name="location1" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location1" /> 中的原始值。

trans-unit.source: If `comparand` and the value in `location1` are equal, then `value` is stored in `location1`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`comparand`和中的值`location1`相等，则`value`存储在`location1`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, no operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: 否则，不会执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: The comparison and the exchange are performed as an atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: 作为一个原子操作执行比较和交换。

trans-unit.source: The return value of this method is the original value in `location1`, whether or not the exchange takes place.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的返回值是中的原始值`location1`、 是否发生交换。

trans-unit.source: This method only supports reference types.
trans-unit.target: 此方法仅支持引用类型。

trans-unit.source: There are overloads of the <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.CompareExchange%2A> method for the value types <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.IntPtr>, <xref:System.Single>, and <xref:System.Double>, but there is no support for other value types.
trans-unit.target: 存在一些重载<xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.CompareExchange%2A>为值类型的方法<xref:System.Int32>， <xref:System.Int64>， <xref:System.IntPtr>， <xref:System.Single>，和<xref:System.Double>，但没有其他值类型的支持。

trans-unit.source: This method overload is preferable to the <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.CompareExchange%28System.Object%40%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Object%29> method overload, because the latter requires the destination object to be accessed late-bound.
trans-unit.target: 此方法重载优于<xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.CompareExchange%28System.Object%40%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Object%29>方法重载，因为后者需要要访问后期绑定的目标对象。

trans-unit.source: The address of <paramref name="location1" /> is a null pointer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location1" /> 的地址为空指针。

trans-unit.source: Decrements a specified variable and stores the result, as an atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: 以原子操作的形式递减指定变量的值并存储结果。

trans-unit.source: The variable whose value is to be decremented.
trans-unit.target: 其值要递减的变量。

trans-unit.source: Decrements a specified variable and stores the result, as an atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: 以原子操作的形式递减指定变量的值并存储结果。

trans-unit.source: The decremented value.
trans-unit.target: 递减的值。

trans-unit.source: This method handles an overflow condition by wrapping: If `location` = <xref:System.Int32.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>, `location` - 1 = <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通过包装来处理溢出情况： 如果`location` = <xref:System.Int32.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>， `location` -1 = <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: No exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 不引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The following example determines how many random numbers that range from 0 to 1,000 are required to generate 1,000 random numbers with a midpoint value.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例确定范围从 0 到 1000 的多少随机数字所需生成 1,000 随机数字的中点值。

trans-unit.source: To keep track of the number of midpoint values, a variable, `midpointCount`, is set equal to 1,000 and decremented each time the random number generator returns a midpoint value.
trans-unit.target: 若要跟踪的中点值，变量数`midpointCount`，是设置等于 1,000 和递减的随机数生成器返回点值每次。

trans-unit.source: Because three threads generate the random numbers, the <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Decrement%28System.Int32%40%29> method is called to ensure that multiple threads don't update `midpointCount` concurrently.
trans-unit.target: 三个线程生成随机数字，因为<xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Decrement%28System.Int32%40%29>调用方法来确保多个线程未更新`midpointCount`并发。

trans-unit.source: Note that a lock is also used to protect the random number generator, and that a <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent> object is used to ensure that the `Main` method doesn't finish execution before the three threads.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，还使用锁来保护随机数生成器，且<xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent>对象用于确保`Main`方法未完成前三个线程的执行。

trans-unit.source: The following example is similar to the previous one, except that it uses the instead of a thread procedure to generate 50,000 random midpoint integers.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例是类似于前一个，只不过它使用而不是一个线程的过程以生成 50000 随机的中点整数。

trans-unit.source: In this example, a lambda expression replaces the `GenerateNumbers` thread procedure, and the call to the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.WaitAll%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method eliminates the need for the <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent> object.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，lambda 表达式替换`GenerateNumbers`线程的过程，并调用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.WaitAll%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法无需进行<xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent>对象。

trans-unit.source: The address of <paramref name="location" /> is a null pointer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location" /> 的地址为空指针。

trans-unit.source: The variable whose value is to be decremented.
trans-unit.target: 其值要递减的变量。

trans-unit.source: Decrements the specified variable and stores the result, as an atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: 以原子操作的形式递减指定变量的值并存储结果。

trans-unit.source: The decremented value.
trans-unit.target: 递减的值。

trans-unit.source: This method handles an overflow condition by wrapping: if `location` = <xref:System.Int64.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>, `location` - 1 = <xref:System.Int64.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通过包装来处理溢出情况： 如果`location` = <xref:System.Int64.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>， `location` -1 = <xref:System.Int64.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: No exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 不引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Read%2A> method and the 64-bit overloads of the <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Increment%2A>, <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Decrement%2A>, and <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Add%2A> methods are truly atomic only on systems where a <xref:System.IntPtr?displayProperty=nameWithType> is 64 bits long.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Read%2A>方法和的 64 位重载<xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Increment%2A>， <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Decrement%2A>，和<xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Add%2A>方法是仅在系统上真正原子是其中<xref:System.IntPtr?displayProperty=nameWithType>长为 64 位。

trans-unit.source: On other systems, these methods are atomic with respect to each other, but not with respect to other means of accessing the data.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法的其他系统上和 64 位，但不是与其他方法来访问数据。

trans-unit.source: Thus, to be thread safe on 32-bit systems, any access to a 64-bit value must be made through the members of the <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked> class.
trans-unit.target: 因此，是线程安全在 32 位系统上，64 位值的任何访问都必须通过的成员<xref:System.Threading.Interlocked>类。

trans-unit.source: The address of <paramref name="location" /> is a null pointer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location" /> 的地址为空指针。

trans-unit.source: Sets a variable to a specified value as an atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: 以原子操作的形式将变量设置为指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The variable to set to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 要设置为指定值的变量。

trans-unit.source: The value to which the <c>location1</c> parameter is set.
trans-unit.target: <c>location1</c> 参数要设置成的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets a double-precision floating point number to a specified value and returns the original value, as an atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: 以原子操作的形式，将双精度浮点数设置为指定的值并返回原始值。

trans-unit.source: The original value of <paramref name="location1" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location1" /> 的原始值。

trans-unit.source: The address of <paramref name="location1" /> is a null pointer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location1" /> 的地址为空指针。

trans-unit.source: The variable to set to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 要设置为指定值的变量。

trans-unit.source: The value to which the <c>location1</c> parameter is set.
trans-unit.target: <c>location1</c> 参数要设置成的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets a 32-bit signed integer to a specified value and returns the original value, as an atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: 以原子操作的形式，将 32 位有符号整数设置为指定的值并返回原始值。

trans-unit.source: The original value of <paramref name="location1" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location1" /> 的原始值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a thread-safe resource locking mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示一个线程安全资源锁定机制。

trans-unit.source: The address of <paramref name="location1" /> is a null pointer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location1" /> 的地址为空指针。

trans-unit.source: The variable to set to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 要设置为指定值的变量。

trans-unit.source: The value to which the <c>location1</c> parameter is set.
trans-unit.target: <c>location1</c> 参数要设置成的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets a 64-bit signed integer to a specified value and returns the original value, as an atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: 以原子操作的形式，将 64 位有符号整数设置为指定的值并返回原始值。

trans-unit.source: The original value of <paramref name="location1" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location1" /> 的原始值。

trans-unit.source: The address of <paramref name="location1" /> is a null pointer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location1" /> 的地址为空指针。

trans-unit.source: The variable to set to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 要设置为指定值的变量。

trans-unit.source: The value to which the <c>location1</c> parameter is set.
trans-unit.target: <c>location1</c> 参数要设置成的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets a platform-specific handle or pointer to a specified value and returns the original value, as an atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: 以原子操作的形式，将平台特定的句柄或指针设置为指定的值并返回原始值。

trans-unit.source: The original value of <paramref name="location1" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location1" /> 的原始值。

trans-unit.source: The address of <paramref name="location1" /> is a null pointer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location1" /> 的地址为空指针。

trans-unit.source: The variable to set to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 要设置为指定值的变量。

trans-unit.source: The value to which the <c>location1</c> parameter is set.
trans-unit.target: <c>location1</c> 参数要设置成的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets an object to a specified value and returns a reference to the original object, as an atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: 以原子操作的形式，将对象设置为指定的值并返回对原始对象的引用。

trans-unit.source: The original value of <paramref name="location1" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location1" /> 的原始值。

trans-unit.source: Beginning with .NET Framework version 2.0, the <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Exchange%60%601%28%60%600%40%2C%60%600%29> method overload provides a type-safe alternative for reference types.
trans-unit.target: 从.NET Framework 2.0 版中，开始<xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Exchange%60%601%28%60%600%40%2C%60%600%29>方法重载提供类型安全的替代方法对于引用类型。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the syntax for using `Exchange` with any reference type object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示使用的语法`Exchange`与任何引用类型对象。

trans-unit.source: The address of <paramref name="location1" /> is a null pointer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location1" /> 的地址为空指针。

trans-unit.source: The variable to set to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 要设置为指定值的变量。

trans-unit.source: The value to which the <c>location1</c> parameter is set.
trans-unit.target: <c>location1</c> 参数要设置成的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets a single-precision floating point number to a specified value and returns the original value, as an atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: 以原子操作的形式，将单精度浮点数设置为指定的值并返回原始值。

trans-unit.source: The original value of <paramref name="location1" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location1" /> 的原始值。

trans-unit.source: The address of <paramref name="location1" /> is a null pointer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location1" /> 的地址为空指针。

trans-unit.source: The type to be used for <c>location1</c> and <c>value</c>.
trans-unit.target: 类型用于<c>位置 1</c>和<c>值</c>。

trans-unit.source: This type must be a reference type.
trans-unit.target: 此类型必须是引用类型。

trans-unit.source: The variable to set to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 要设置为指定值的变量。

trans-unit.source: This is a reference parameter (<see langword="ref" /> in C#, <see langword="ByRef" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 这是一个引用参数（C# 中为 <see langword="ref" />，Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="ByRef" />）。

trans-unit.source: The value to which the <c>location1</c> parameter is set.
trans-unit.target: <c>location1</c> 参数要设置成的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets a variable of the specified type <paramref name="T" /> to a specified value and returns the original value, as an atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: 将指定类型 <paramref name="T" /> 的变量设置为指定值，并将原始值作为原子操作返回。

trans-unit.source: The original value of <paramref name="location1" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location1" /> 的原始值。

trans-unit.source: This method only supports reference types.
trans-unit.target: 此方法仅支持引用类型。

trans-unit.source: There are overloads of the <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Exchange%2A> method for the <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.IntPtr>, <xref:System.Single>, and <xref:System.Double> value types, but there is no support for other value types.
trans-unit.target: 存在一些重载<xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Exchange%2A>方法<xref:System.Int32>， <xref:System.Int64>， <xref:System.IntPtr>， <xref:System.Single>，和<xref:System.Double>值类型，但没有其他值类型的支持。

trans-unit.source: This method overload is preferable to the <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Exchange%28System.Object%40%2CSystem.Object%29> method overload, because the latter requires late-bound access to the destination object .
trans-unit.target: 此方法重载优于<xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Exchange%28System.Object%40%2CSystem.Object%29>方法重载，因为后者需要到目标对象的后期绑定访问。

trans-unit.source: The following example launches ten tasks, each of which generates 100 ten-character part numbers.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将启动十个任务，其中每个生成 100 10 个字符的部件号。

trans-unit.source: It then the part number that is first alphabetically.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它是第一个按字母排序的部件号。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the `firstWidget` variable to store the ID that occurs first in the sort order.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用`firstWidget`变量存储在排序顺序中的哪个操作先发生的 ID。

trans-unit.source: It compares each ID that it generates with the `firstWidget` value.
trans-unit.target: 它将生成与每个 ID 进行比较`firstWidget`值。

trans-unit.source: If the new value precedes the current value of `firstWidget` in the sort order, the example calls the <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Exchange%2A> method to assign the new value to `firstWidget`.
trans-unit.target: 如果新值位于之前的当前值`firstWidget`在排序顺序中，该示例调用<xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Exchange%2A>方法以将新值赋给`firstWidget`。

trans-unit.source: The address of <paramref name="location1" /> is a null pointer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location1" /> 的地址为空指针。

trans-unit.source: Increments a specified variable and stores the result, as an atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: 以原子操作的形式递增指定变量的值并存储结果。

trans-unit.source: The variable whose value is to be incremented.
trans-unit.target: 其值要递增的变量。

trans-unit.source: Increments a specified variable and stores the result, as an atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: 以原子操作的形式递增指定变量的值并存储结果。

trans-unit.source: The incremented value.
trans-unit.target: 递增的值。

trans-unit.source: This method handles an overflow condition by wrapping: if `location` = <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>, `location` + 1 = <xref:System.Int32.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通过包装来处理溢出情况： 如果`location` = <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>， `location` + 1 = <xref:System.Int32.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: No exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 不引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The following example determines how many random numbers that range from 0 to 1,000 are required to generate 1,000 random numbers with a midpoint value.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例确定范围从 0 到 1000 的多少随机数字所需生成 1,000 随机数字的中点值。

trans-unit.source: To keep track of the number of midpoint values, a variable, `midpointCount`, is set equal to 0 and incremented each time the random number generator returns a midpoint value until it reaches 10,000.
trans-unit.target: 若要跟踪的中点值，变量数`midpointCount`、 将设置为等于 0 和在每的次递增的随机数生成器返回点值，直至到达 10,000。

trans-unit.source: Because three threads generate the random numbers, the <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Increment%28System.Int32%40%29> method is called to ensure that multiple threads don't update `midpointCount` concurrently.
trans-unit.target: 三个线程生成随机数字，因为<xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Increment%28System.Int32%40%29>调用方法来确保多个线程未更新`midpointCount`并发。

trans-unit.source: Note that a lock is also used to protect the random number generator, and that a <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent> object is used to ensure that the `Main` method doesn't finish execution before the three threads.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，还使用锁来保护随机数生成器，且<xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent>对象用于确保`Main`方法未完成前三个线程的执行。

trans-unit.source: The following example is similar to the previous one, except that it uses the instead of a thread procedure to generate 50,000 random midpoint integers.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例是类似于前一个，只不过它使用而不是一个线程的过程以生成 50000 随机的中点整数。

trans-unit.source: In this example, a lambda expression replaces the `GenerateNumbers` thread procedure, and the call to the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.WaitAll%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method eliminates the need for the <xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent> object.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，lambda 表达式替换`GenerateNumbers`线程的过程，并调用<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.WaitAll%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法无需进行<xref:System.Threading.CountdownEvent>对象。

trans-unit.source: The address of <paramref name="location" /> is a null pointer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location" /> 的地址为空指针。

trans-unit.source: The variable whose value is to be incremented.
trans-unit.target: 其值要递增的变量。

trans-unit.source: Increments a specified variable and stores the result, as an atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: 以原子操作的形式递增指定变量的值并存储结果。

trans-unit.source: The incremented value.
trans-unit.target: 递增的值。

trans-unit.source: This method handles an overflow condition by wrapping: if `location` = <xref:System.Int64.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>, `location` + 1 = <xref:System.Int64.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通过包装来处理溢出情况： 如果`location` = <xref:System.Int64.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>， `location` + 1 = <xref:System.Int64.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: No exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 不引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Read%2A> method and the 64-bit overloads of the <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Increment%2A>, <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Decrement%2A>, and <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Add%2A> methods are truly atomic only on systems where a <xref:System.IntPtr?displayProperty=nameWithType> is 64 bits long.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Read%2A>方法和的 64 位重载<xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Increment%2A>， <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Decrement%2A>，和<xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Add%2A>方法是仅在系统上真正原子是其中<xref:System.IntPtr?displayProperty=nameWithType>长为 64 位。

trans-unit.source: On other systems, these methods are atomic with respect to each other, but not with respect to other means of accessing the data.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法的其他系统上和 64 位，但不是与其他方法来访问数据。

trans-unit.source: Thus, to be thread safe on 32-bit systems, any access to a 64-bit value must be made through the members of the <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked> class.
trans-unit.target: 因此，是线程安全在 32 位系统上，64 位值的任何访问都必须通过的成员<xref:System.Threading.Interlocked>类。

trans-unit.source: The address of <paramref name="location" /> is a null pointer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="location" /> 的地址为空指针。

trans-unit.source: Synchronizes memory access as follows: The processor that executes the current thread cannot reorder instructions in such a way that memory accesses before the call to <see cref="M:System.Threading.Interlocked.MemoryBarrier" /> execute after memory accesses that follow the call to <see cref="M:System.Threading.Interlocked.MemoryBarrier" />.
trans-unit.target: 按如下方式同步内存存取：执行当前线程的处理器在对指令重新排序时，不能采用先执行 <see cref="M:System.Threading.Interlocked.MemoryBarrier" /> 调用之后的内存存取，再执行 <see cref="M:System.Threading.Interlocked.MemoryBarrier" /> 调用之前的内存存取的方式。

trans-unit.source: This method was added to the <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked> class in the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] as a convenience; it's a wrapper for the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.MemoryBarrier%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法已添加到<xref:System.Threading.Interlocked>类[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]为方便起见; 它是包装器<xref:System.Threading.Thread.MemoryBarrier%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.MemoryBarrier%2A> is required only on multiprocessor systems that have weak memory ordering (for example, a system that employs multiple Intel Itanium processors).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.MemoryBarrier%2A> 仅在多处理器系统具有弱内存排序 （例如，使用多个 Intel 的 Itanium 处理器的系统） 上所需。

trans-unit.source: For most purposes, the C# `lock` statement, the Visual Basic `SyncLock` statement, or the <xref:System.Threading.Monitor> class provide easier ways to synchronize data.
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，C#`lock`语句，Visual Basic`SyncLock`语句，或<xref:System.Threading.Monitor>类提供简单的方法，用于将数据同步。

trans-unit.source: The 64-bit value to be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 要加载的 64 位值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a 64-bit value, loaded as an atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个以原子操作形式加载的 64 位值。

trans-unit.source: The loaded value.
trans-unit.target: 加载的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Read%2A> method is unnecessary on 64-bit systems, because 64-bit read operations are already atomic.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Read%2A>方法是在 64 位系统上不必要的因为 64 位读取的操作已是原子性。

trans-unit.source: On 32-bit systems, 64-bit read operations are not atomic unless performed using <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Read%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在 32 位系统上 64 位读取的操作不除非使用执行原子<xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Read%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Read%2A> method and the 64-bit overloads of the <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Increment%2A>, <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Decrement%2A>, and <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Add%2A> methods are truly atomic only on systems where a <xref:System.IntPtr?displayProperty=nameWithType> is 64 bits long.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Read%2A>方法和的 64 位重载<xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Increment%2A>， <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Decrement%2A>，和<xref:System.Threading.Interlocked.Add%2A>方法是仅在系统上真正原子是其中<xref:System.IntPtr?displayProperty=nameWithType>长为 64 位。

trans-unit.source: On other systems, these methods are atomic with respect to each other, but not with respect to other means of accessing the data.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法的其他系统上和 64 位，但不是与其他方法来访问数据。

trans-unit.source: Thus, to be thread safe on 32-bit systems, any access to a 64-bit value must be made through the members of the <xref:System.Threading.Interlocked> class.
trans-unit.target: 因此，是线程安全在 32 位系统上，64 位值的任何访问都必须通过的成员<xref:System.Threading.Interlocked>类。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IntPtr> is a platform-specific type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IntPtr> 是特定于平台的类型。
